extendedInfo.description: Desi Pool Expert android game is a simple yet challenging pool game with realistic physical experience. Once you start, you can't stop!????? How to play ?????- Touch the arrow of the stick where u want to fix and then just touch the screen to hit the ball.- You need to score as many points as possible within the given time, since each stage has target points to proceed to the next stage.????? Highlighted Features ?????- Five courts, choose your favorite themed environment.- Great shooting experience.- Various difficulty levels, to make the game more exciting and interesting.- Well-designed pools, to make the game more enjoyable and addictive.- Bright and vibrant graphics & effects;.- It is a game that is accessible for people of all ages. There is no limit to the amount of fun that can be had in Pocket Desi Pool Expert ! This apps is ads supported thanks for your understanding Tags: Desi pool free,snooker expert, free billiards game,pool fewer

reviews.title: Terrible experience!!!, nothing other than ads on this game.
reviews.comment: I started this game, License agreement appeared, i clicked accept... Then like an infinite loop ADs keep coming. What the hell this app is?  Only made to show \"free app of the day!\"
reviews.author: bindesh singh
